website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight hair spray that adds volume and controls frizz.
pros: Adds weight and volume to thin hair
Holds hair in place but still allows movement
cons: Not for those looking for a product with a really strong hold

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: My first experience with this hairspray was in a salon. I absolutely loved the scent. I'm very sensitive to smells, so I mainly bought this for the scent, which is the best (most tolerable) I've ever smelled for a hairspray. It's got a vanilla-musky scent to it, which is very distinct. No disgusting chemical smell. I also like it because it's a flexible hold hairspray, so it doesn't make your hair crunchy or sticky. It gives you just enough hold and lasts for a decent amount of time. I don't care about the price because I don't want to smell like chemicals or cheap "grandma's church perfume" hairspray. LOL I'd recommend this for that alone. It is pretty great though.
customer_reviews.author: Powerpuffed

customer_reviews.title: THIS STUFF REALLY WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I...I will be willing to bet there are very few women out there with as "thin" (I hesitate to use "fine", because my hair does NOT fit the description of fine...in a positive way...smile)...I've heard about this product, but never tried it, so ordered it in travel size...IT WORKS, IT WORKS, IT REALLY DOES!!! A small amount is all I need and my hair REALLY looks fuller! Thank you, Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth L

customer_reviews.title: Damaged and half empty.
customer_reviews.text: The bottle came all covered in marks and has a big stain of something on it. You cant see it front he photos but the damn thing is half empty already even though the sticker claims new. I do NOT recommend, just go buy in store so you know new.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product shipped was defective
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and have used it for years -- the very best for shaping and holding without looking like a "bullet head." But this time I decided to try and order via Amazon rather than Nordstrom and the product I received was defective-- ordered 2 and both just drizzled out liquid, no spray action. Unfortunately for me, I'd ordered in advance to make sure I didn't run out and didn't open the cans until day 32 -- 2 days after the deadline for returning a product. My fault but still, out a lot of cash. Going back to Nordstrom. Amazon needs to watch quality of their vendors and now I'm leery of trusting them as much. Sigh.
customer_reviews.author: CalifCarol13

customer_reviews.title: Also I like that the bottle is smaller than traditional sized bottles
customer_reviews.text: Will never use another hair spray again. This stuff is magical. It’s flexible yet firm, I don’t know how. I have curly/wavy hair, but I blow dry my bangs straight & use this to keep them in place. Also I like that the bottle is smaller than traditional sized bottles, but you get the same amount. If you’re uncertain about it, get the travel size to try it out (that’s what I did) & you will soon see how great it is.
customer_reviews.author: MHoisi

customer_reviews.title: The perfect spray bottle and product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hairspray because it goes on gentle and then holds all day. It has quite a strong smell but like an expensive perfume. The scent disappears quite quickly. Most hairsprays that I have used clog up very quickly and then it becomes a problem spraying. Not so with Living Proof! They seem to have perfected the art of the constant spray bottle. Living Proof products are expensive but well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: janetep

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous hair don't care
customer_reviews.text: Hair is one of the most important things on earth. This hair spray, in travel size, is something you should put on your hair. It doesn't smell as good as Oribe, but it holds much better--without holding too much. I used Oribe superfine hairspray which smells divine, but it doesn't hold my luxurious hair in place. This flex spray is dependable and never gets too hard while keeping my hair in perfect shape. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin M

customer_reviews.title: travel size hair spray
customer_reviews.text: I love living proof stuff and I like that I can now have travel size hair spray. Smells clean, but also does a good job of light control. If you're looking for heavy control, this isn't it. But when you're traveling and just need to control a few wild hairs, this well do it.
customer_reviews.author: ForeverYOUNGTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Great flex hold!
customer_reviews.text: I love Living Proof hair products. I use the Perfect Hair Day shampoo and conditioner and this flex spray works great on my long hair. I use it daily to keep my bangs in place and by the end of the day they look the same as they did that morning. Never sticky or stringy looking. I have long straight hair that doesn't always hold curl but I used it today after using a curling wand and the curls lasted pretty much all day. Even the few spots where the curl fell, the hair stayed looking pretty as other hairsprays have left my hair hard, oily and stringy looking. The added bonus is that it smells divine!
customer_reviews.author: JamieD

customer_reviews.title: Broken when I got it
customer_reviews.text: Was super excited for this hair spray since I have other Living Proof products and mine was broken when I got it. It either doesn’t spray at all or dribbles out in a stream down the bottle. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: touchable hold, no flakes and smells great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who is a dancer and has to transition hairstyles during shows. Other hairsprays left white flakes in her dark hair after combing to change styles but this one does not. It provides firm hold but remains flexible and doesn’t flake. Also smells great, not chemical like other brands, which is a nice bonus. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Ault

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: It keeps your hair where you want it and smells like a fresh powder instead of hairspray. The size is perfect for travel but I wished it was not in an aerosol can. For travel I prefer just a push spray can.
customer_reviews.author: 2Lips

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, smell good, flexible hairspray - worth the cost!
customer_reviews.text: Love this hairspray! It has a good hold but not stiff looking. I still can run my fingers through my hair and this hairspray remembers where I want my hair to be somehow. Flex is really a great explanation of the hold. It smells good too!
customer_reviews.author: C Fults

customer_reviews.title: Good for Movement and keeping your 'do fresh
customer_reviews.text: I use this spray when I want my style to look as though I just did it but still want bounce- like when I curl my hair. This is NOT suitable if you need any sort of hold, such as an updo or if you can't have your hair moving about. The smell is pretty perfume-y but my husband likes it so I'm cool with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jen R

customer_reviews.title: This Product Will Not Last
customer_reviews.text: I received this item on July 24 - since that time I have used it probably 8-10 times and it is already coming apart at the seam. The seller recommended I apply for a refund - knowing that you cannot after 5-6 weeks. So - while the item was extremely good and helping me to keep my arm straight during my swing. . . . .I'm going to have to order another product since this one is falling apart. I would not order this product again because it's not possible to return if it does not last 2-3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Camera

customer_reviews.title: Strong hold but soft feeling
customer_reviews.text: Holds well, doesn’t leave hair stiff nor feeling like you have a lot of product in your hair. Great size for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Grammyx5

customer_reviews.title: If you want flexibility in your styling...
customer_reviews.text: I have a short, pixie style haircut and I love the flexibility I have to move my hair around and restyle as needed without the crunchy/firmness/stickiness of a normal hairspray. I have used this product for years and have never found anything comparable. Give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: Tifinie

customer_reviews.title: Good product, poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: This product us light weight and holds really well. The reason for the 2 star rating is how it was packaged and delivered. This was my second time ordering and I had no issues the first time. This time the hairspray was missing the lid and there was build up around the spray opening like it was used. This item is not available for return.
customer_reviews.author: DBlake

customer_reviews.title: Yup it costs Wayyyy to much!
customer_reviews.text: but, damn it is soooo good I Pay for it over and over. I holds, it tames the frizzzies, and it combs through easily. And, here is one you won't hear often it seems to absorb the greasies so I don't have to shampoo as often. So yeah, 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: grandma d

customer_reviews.title: My sweet addiction!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try this for something new after using nexxus comb thru hairspray for years. Not only do I love the feel of the can while using it and the design of the clog-free nozzle, but the scent of the product is oh so sweet! I love candy so this gives me aromatherapy along with the style and frizz control. A little goes a long way and it's definitely for all hair types - best part is you control the hold!
customer_reviews.author: Foodie

customer_reviews.title: Great spray to style
customer_reviews.text: I love this spray when I'm trying to get my flat bangs to show a little volume, texture and style. It's light enough to allow some movement, but not too stiff to limit your ability to style. Once I get my look I pull out the big guns to keep them in place. :0) Kenra Spray 25 holds things in place really well.
customer_reviews.author: varasztan

customer_reviews.title: Spitting Sprayer
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand. When I saw it on Amazon I was excited that it was available. Otherwise, it is a 25 mile drive to purchase. My previous cans had a very fine mist. This can has a defective spray nozzle. Instead of a spray mist, it is like a household cleaning product spray including spitting and dripping. To say I am disappointed is an understatement. I was depending on amazon to deliver a product equivalent to my store purchased cans. Now I have to make the 25 mile drive to purchase a can.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, I have bought and loved this product in the past but having just opened the new hairspray that I ordered a while back I see that the nozzle does not work properly. It does not spray but rather shoots out a line of spray. It came defective and it is past time to return it. I hate wasting my money, therefore, I must give it only one star.
customer_reviews.author: Michele K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: You can't even tell this is in your hair, yet it stays put!! Living Proof products always amazed me. I'm definitely on a budget, but I save and make an exception for these products!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight Spray That Holds Your Style For Hours
customer_reviews.text: Ohmygosh this is the lightest, dreamiest hair spray! It is not a spray that makes your hair stiff and crunchy....it just lightly holds and keeps the shape of your style for hours. I love how light it is. Smells good too. Love the Living Proof line of products, but this is one of my absolute favorites. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Julie K. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Great flexible hairspray
customer_reviews.text: I like. firm hold with not looking like I am wearing hairspray - this product is like that and super light weight and smells good! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Krutmeier

customer_reviews.title: Smells fresh and feels very light
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent ! I’ve heard many say it smells like vanilla I think it smells like fresh baby powder. It feels light on my hair not sticky
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Natural Look
customer_reviews.text: I have struggled with hairspray for my very fine hair all my life. This spray is wonderful - doesn’t weigh me down and holds in a soft and flexible way. No stiff hair!
customer_reviews.author: Jomma

customer_reviews.title: This hairspray is terrible! It does have a flexible hold but it ...
customer_reviews.text: This hairspray is terrible! It does have a flexible hold but it doesn't keep your curls! I sprayed SO much of this hair spray because my curls were falling out before I even finished curling my hair! Definitely not worth the price! I completely regret my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: roxaphi

customer_reviews.title: Holy Grail Hairspray
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this hairspray. It works great, and it leaves NO CRUNCH! So great. It's also beautifully packaged and beautifully made by conscious company.
customer_reviews.author: Private Username

customer_reviews.title: Hairspray at it's best
customer_reviews.text: I am not a hairspray user until my hairstylist used this on my hair. It is light but it has a good control for flyaway hair. Will keep this product on my shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Peaches70

customer_reviews.title: Hairspray
customer_reviews.text: This is quite expensive. I have fine hair. This hairspray does not hold the style at all. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: skd

customer_reviews.title: Expensive for the size
customer_reviews.text: It's expensive for the size. Works great on fine hair. I really like this hairspray a lot but not sure if I'll buy on a regular basis because of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica D.

customer_reviews.title: Love Living Proof Line
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good product line. I like the flex spray, but prefer their control spray better. Flex has a tendency to get sticky while Control keeps hair dry through many applications and just hods.
customer_reviews.author: T Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever Hairspray
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to style and hold my fine, thin hair. It will let me work to build the hair style that I want and help with hold all day. Big plus for this product is it’s great smell! LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: loves to shop

customer_reviews.title: A light hair spray
customer_reviews.text: This is a very light spray, but it keeps your hair in place all day long. Not sticky like some of the hair sprays are.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Reid

customer_reviews.title: Best of the best!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best hairspray I have ever used! Lightweight but holds. No strong smell. Worth every penny of the price!
customer_reviews.author: SusanD

customer_reviews.title: Spray heads didn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: I love this spray and I ordered two bottles. Neither would spray and it costs too much to return.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Too fragrant
customer_reviews.text: Works well but the fragrance is WAY too strong and not my favorite scent. I smell it all day. If there was an unscented version, I’d probably use it.
customer_reviews.author: Miz Luv

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product
customer_reviews.text: Nozzle doesn’t work and product seems watery. I’ve used it before from the Living Proof site and this is much different. There was a black marker dot on the bottom, so thinking it was damaged or resold. Cannot return, either. Don’t buy from here.
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Hairspray failed to spray.
customer_reviews.text: This product failed to spray. The nozzle is too small an opening. It got clogged and since there is NO RETURN POLICY I was forced to throw it out. Very disappointed-I lost $18.00!!
customer_reviews.author: Romancefanreader

customer_reviews.title: So worth the price
customer_reviews.text: My absolute favorite hairspray! Despite the little bit of high cost, so worth it. It also smells great!
customer_reviews.author: Halle T.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me!
customer_reviews.text: I love that it works without being too stiff and that it smells yummy!
customer_reviews.author: P Haughey

customer_reviews.title: Not flexible on my gray hair!
customer_reviews.text: This spray dries very crispy. I can’t brush through it easily at the end of the day and causes my hair to break.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Diane Roche Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyers beware !
customer_reviews.text: I would love to get a good review on a great product but you can’t ship items that possibly could be used and or tampered with and without a lid and a broken nozzle! Commonsense people !!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell, the hold, and the fact that I can run my hands through my hair and it will still look and feel great. Initially received the can with a busted spray button and the company shipped me a new can right away. Expensive, but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: I love Living Proof products
customer_reviews.text: I love Living Proof products, but this hairspray majorly disappointed. I have somewhat fine hair, and all this did was make it crunchy in random places. It smelled good, that's about the only plus. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Lima_Bean_00

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Not strong enough to hold my fine hair In place .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Came as expected. Cap taped on, which was an appreciated caution move that made product arrive clean and safe.
customer_reviews.author: Kath the grey

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: If you have fine hair that needs a spray you can shape with, this is the perfect product! It is also not to heavy... my hair is very fine.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Best hairspray I’ve every used! ( I have fine straight hair)
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. It’s worth every penny! I have very fine hair and need this type of product to give my hair some volume.
customer_reviews.author: Perry & Patty

customer_reviews.title: Love this spray and fragrance
customer_reviews.text: Saw it on a you tube demonstration for short pixie hair cuts. remembered the name and found it on good old Amazon. It is only the pricey side. But for me it was worth it for short hair!
customer_reviews.author: jean Lovejoy

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Loveeeee the smell of this hairspray. Hold my hair very well. Almost too well. Will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin E. McCrea

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This hairspray leaves my hair soft and flexible, and it smells really nice - which is a critical factor. It came highly recommended, and I was not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Spelunker

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work OK.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t see an amazing difference, but has been OK to have on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Jud

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, doesn't make my hair feel crunchy. Works great for my wavy hair
customer_reviews.author: Briana

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: freaking love this hair spray. i have lots of baby fine hair which gets tangly and frizzy by the end of the day. this keeps it in place, lasts all day, smells BOMB, and is flexible. love it. my first bottle came from sephora. my second from here. ill keep repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Oakheart

customer_reviews.title: Won't spray
customer_reviews.text: No pressure in the bottle for it to spray. Was able to squeeze some out to use as styling lotion, but it stopped running after a couple squeezes.
customer_reviews.author: April L Knudsen

customer_reviews.title: Smells so good!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great medium hold hairspray and smells really good!
customer_reviews.author: K. Maitland

customer_reviews.title: Just Ok...
customer_reviews.text: It is Ok. Makes hair a little sticky if you put to much on your hair, but if you use just a little, is OK. Not better than other, cheaper hairsprays. I will use it because I bought it, but I will not buy again, nor recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Audri

customer_reviews.title: Love this hair spray!
customer_reviews.text: The best hair spray! Light, but holds my long style all day.
customer_reviews.author: Pacificdreamer

customer_reviews.title: Best hairspray ever
customer_reviews.text: holds, but not a helmet. Brushes out soft but then adds body.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Morris

customer_reviews.title: Love every product in the line!
customer_reviews.text: Best product line on the market! Love everything in this line!
customer_reviews.author: Momma24

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The spray nozzle didn’t work and was leaking. Had to return it and I was very disappointed because I was eagerly awaiting its arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn M.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t order product online
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product though I would not order again on line. Product is defective- nozzle does not work at all. Nothing comes out. Bottle arrived sticky also. Unfortunately I did not realize it can’t be returned so literally stuck with it now. It’s a shame - ordered to save money as product is pricey and now I paid salon price for a new bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick D.

customer_reviews.title: This hairspray is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hairspray. It is a reasonable price. It sprays a fine mist and has a flexible hold. You cannot go wrong with this. It is not sticky at all.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: I like your other products that I have tried but this one no.
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t hold up to humidity! At all for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: this product works as stated!
customer_reviews.text: Yhis product works great, imagine that a product that preforms as its states it will. I have been using this product for a few years and its wonderful. I really has no sent that I can tell.
customer_reviews.author: LOLA

customer_reviews.title: Definately has an interesting smell, but seems to work ...
customer_reviews.text: Definately has an interesting smell, but seems to work and hold up for longer than other sprays I have used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: harleychick

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Can’t go wrong with anything Living Proof!!!! Smells great and works great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Keith

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter ordered these for college and likes the product
customer_reviews.author: CC, WI

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel Product
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for adding body when styling hair and giving a soft, flexible finish after styling - I love it for styling my hair.
customer_reviews.author: babswb

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Hairspray
customer_reviews.text: This hairspray is fantastic!! I love everything about it. It adds body and volume to both clean and dirty hair and holds the hair in place. The scent is also amazing! Normally hairspray stinks but not this stuff! I also feel like a lot goes a long way so you get good bang for your buck! Will totally buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Meghanne Paske

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hairspray for all hair types
customer_reviews.text: This is some of the best hairspray I've tried in a long time. Trust me I've tried way to many to count. It doesn't weigh my hair down and keeps its hold thru out the day. I have very fine and thin hair so I have to be careful what I put in and on my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Weezie Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This hairspray is salon quality. It does not stiffen hair, but gives a nice soft hold and smells delicious.
customer_reviews.author: donna

customer_reviews.title: Great finishing spray
customer_reviews.text: Love the light hold as a great finishing spray! Like other products it is very good for thin fine hair!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Goforth

customer_reviews.title: Defective Product
customer_reviews.text: For the second time, this product came to me defective. The contents do not have enough pressure to spray out the nozzle, so the contents just drip out. Can't use on my hair. How can I receive a refund or a replacement?
customer_reviews.author: Darleen V. Thorig

customer_reviews.title: Great spray, faulty/bad QA (container)
customer_reviews.text: Great hairspray but the container is faulty. This is the only hairspray I use and for my past 2 orders, the container was delivered without any aerosol spray rendering the product useless.
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: Great product, size great for travelers
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Doesn’t leave you with “helmet hair”. Love the travel six for convenience
customer_reviews.author: @Ruxsom

customer_reviews.title: This hair spray is worth buying for the smell alone ...
customer_reviews.text: This hair spray is worth buying for the smell alone and if you want a light holding spay this is it
customer_reviews.author: sharilynn

customer_reviews.title: received with the top of spray broken off!! + replacement that had top but wouldn’t spray
customer_reviews.text: couldn't use with top of spray broken got a second replacement bottle which also would not spray. I give up $ wasted
customer_reviews.author: joc

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: Spray Heads did not work and never could get them to work. Defective products ... beware!
customer_reviews.author: KAGTX

customer_reviews.title: Smells bad
customer_reviews.text: This product smells awful. I can’t use it to see if it actually works because the smell is so strong and overpowering to me. Yuck. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Louie

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hairspray! It holds well but my thick hair stays soft. I've just reordered.
customer_reviews.author: mcoop

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny...
customer_reviews.text: This whole line of products is amazing. I have straight fine hair. I rely on this for blow outs and volume. It's expensive but a must have for me. Of all the living proof stuff this is my favorite. Granted, I'm no Jennifer Anniston, but my hair looks good for a Mom.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine K. Carlisle

customer_reviews.title: received what feels to be a half empty bottle that will not spray!
customer_reviews.text: I would not buy from this company again. I received what feels to be a half empty bottle that will not spray! The sprayer is BROKEN and just squirts out liquid. bummer bc i really wanted to try this product!
customer_reviews.author: Conrad John Cornish

customer_reviews.title: Best Hairspray Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this hair spray for several years and I find it's the best for me. Very effective and long-lasting. No need to touch up your hair during the day.
customer_reviews.author: SAG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect soft hold.
customer_reviews.text: Love this soft hold. Perfect for my mid length hair. Holds soft curls all day.
customer_reviews.author: ARamblingRose

customer_reviews.title: Not stiff and sticky.
customer_reviews.text: Not sticky; light consistancy; hold very well without being stiff; price is right.
customer_reviews.author: tal2nd

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Best hairspray I’ve used. Not too stiff or light. Just right. Gives and keeps body.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fine hair, worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: I've got fine hair, that lacks in volume. However that doesn't mean I don't crave to use some hairspray to keep my perfectly styled hair from fading throughout the day. Living proof hit the nail on the head. This leaves my style flexible while giving me a hint of extra volume. Plus the smell is heavenly !!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Helps hold style shape
customer_reviews.text: I have fine hair...I dry, style, spray then wait to comb/brush and use hairspray
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: I bought 2 bottles and NEITHER WORKED
customer_reviews.text: I loveeee Living Proof Flex Hiarspray. Sadly, I just went to use these and both of the sprayers were broken and won't spray correctly
customer_reviews.author: Chelsie Morales

customer_reviews.title: No residue
customer_reviews.text: Great hold & brushes out easily leaving no residue so you can use styling tools the next day without worry
customer_reviews.author: mjd

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite hairspray. It's amazing how it can hold but ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite hairspray. It's amazing how it can hold but be so flexible at the same time. I don't care for the smell but, hey, it's hair spray.
customer_reviews.author: Jess C.

customer_reviews.title: Won't Spray
customer_reviews.text: Have ordered Several times without problems. Got my order today & Bottle won't Spray. Cannot be returned. What a waste of money. No More! One Star because I can't leave Zero.
customer_reviews.author: Becky G

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is now my favorite hair spray. I am a professional stylist, and I am hooked on Living Proof, paying retail for their products kills me, I normally can buy professional products for wholesale price, and I know how much of a mark up is on hair care products, but these are worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy B. Pennell

customer_reviews.title: For hold with movement
customer_reviews.text: Love living proof products - perfect hairspray - it holds but has movement. I only use very little and sparingly because too much will weigh down hair- more for gently hold to keep hair in gentle place not for strong holds
customer_reviews.author: RPRZ

customer_reviews.title: Too pricey .
customer_reviews.text: Like the product but I thought the price was too pricey for me as I am retired. Also it's hard to press to get the spray as I have arthritis in my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Myrna dupee

customer_reviews.title: Not sticky!
customer_reviews.text: Smells soooo good. Great hold without stickiness. Wish it was a little less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: AJ in NYC

product_meta.title: Living proof Flex Hairspray, Medium Hold, 7.5 oz
